Woolworth, the owner of the world's highest skyscraper. Conry, who credits the story to one of his colleagues, Congressman Robert E. Diefenderfer of Jenkintown, Penn., said:

docs.snippet: Degrees were conferred on 550 graduates of the schools of New York University at the eighty-first annual commencement of the university yesterday. The commencement exercises were divided into two sessions. In the morning the graduates of the College...
docs.lead_paragraph: Degrees were conferred on 550 graduates of the schools of New York University at the eighty-first annual commencement of the university yesterday. The commencement exercises were divided into two sessions. In the morning the graduates of the College of Arts and Pure Science, the School of Applied Science, the Washington Square Collegiate Division, and the Graduate School received their degrees.
docs.abstract: receives ovation on presentation of degree at N. Y. University

headline.main: WHITMAN OVATION AT N.Y. UNIVERSITY; Audience Stands and Cheers While He Receives the Degree of Doctor of Laws.

docs.snippet: BERLIN, June 4. -- The Berlin Boerse was badly affected to-day by yesterday's New York markets and by the rumor that the Baltimore  Ohio dividend was to be reduced. This caused heavy selling of Baltimore  Ohio shares. Canadian Pacifics also were...
docs.lead_paragraph: BERLIN, June 4. -- The Berlin Boerse was badly affected to-day by yesterday's New York markets and by the rumor that the Baltimore Ohio dividend was to be reduced. This caused heavy selling of Baltimore Ohio shares. Canadian Pacifics also were heavily sold, particularly for the Paris account.

headline.main: BERLIN BADLY AFFECTED.; Heavy Selling of Baltimore & Ohio and Canadian Pacific.

docs.snippet: Every large city should have a great central department of identification, not merely for criminals but for every one of its inhabitants, in the opinion of Dr. Juan Vucetich, Chief of the Bureaus of Identification of the Province of Buenos Aires and...
docs.lead_paragraph: Every large city should have a great central department of identification, not merely for criminals but for every one of its inhabitants, in the opinion of Dr. Juan Vucetich, Chief of the Bureaus of Identification of the Province of Buenos Aires and of the Argentine War Department, who arrived at the Waldorf yesterday.

docs.snippet: Middlemen and retailers throughout the city yesterday were neither excited nor enthusiastic at the announcement that the White Star liner Baltic, which docked on Saturday, had brought to this port from England the first consignment of Argentine beef...
docs.lead_paragraph: Middlemen and retailers throughout the city yesterday were neither excited nor enthusiastic at the announcement that the White Star liner Baltic, which docked on Saturday, had brought to this port from England the first consignment of Argentine beef ever landed here. The general opinion appeared to be that, under the present tariff on dressed beef, South American cattle could not affect the market perceptibly.
docs.abstract: campaigns for lower rates on excess baggage

headline.main: ARGENTINE BEEF HERE FROM LONDON; Local Dealers Unconcerned Because They Say It Is Only a Shipment of Speculators.
